연구
주요연구분야
Energy Materials (Li-ion cell and Fuel cell)
■ From computational approaches, we will design and develop new electrode and electrolyte materials for SOFCs and PEMFCs for our green energy sources in our future.
■ In addition to fuel cells, we also have interests about Li-ion batteries, S-ion batteries, functionalized materials for ionic conductor, hydrogen or CO2 storage and utilization.
Low Energy & Emission Vehicle Development
■ The research purpose of this topic is the development of exhaust gas purification system for the Super Ultra Low Energy & Emission Vehicle (SULEEV).
Catalyst design
■ Our group focused on the investigation of reaction mechanism, origin of catalytic activity, and active sites for chemical reactions. From those knowledge, we design new catalytic materials in various applications, such as Automotive Catalyst / Hydrogen Production & Storage / COx & NOx conversion / CO2 utilization / Single Atom Catalyst / Reforming of CH4 / HER / ORR / OER.
